column4: 36GiB of .pdfs??!!? what did you do down load the entire Wikipedia?
it's a year worth of a local newspaper
the cheap <bad people> don't want to put up an archive of old newspapers.. but they make todays paper available on their website.. say hello to mr wget and mr cron =)
hehe.. I've got the room to spare =)
yeah my newspaper is the same way, that's a good idea actually
how exactly do you do wget to make it a .pdf though? could you PM me on how?
they offer a pdf for download.. I just download them
but I guess you could use firefox and a pdf-printer .. it wouldn't be as pretty.. but it would work I guess
ill check and see if they offer pdf, thanks :)
most is kind of nice too
you can always use the !no, backup is bla bla bla better links bla bla bla command to suggest a change to a factoid
all the links for "GUI backup apps" on that site are broke
Ive done that before they never get approved
two weeks ago i suggested a change for !tab because !tab DOES NOT tell anyone exacty how to use it, it just says it's availble blah blah, so im not updating anymore factoids </rant>
hmm.. you can always talk to the bot-guy.. I think there is a channel for the bots to play in.. he usually pops by there every now and then
haven't seen one.. I forget what I use.. it's been running the last 2 years without any problems..sbackup perhaps
that sbackup program is great! Thanks again :)
